title: Hotel Check-in
description: Practice checking into a hotel in Chinese (Taiwan)
chineseDescription: 練習台灣飯店入住對話
chineseObjective: 成功完成飯店入住流程

checkpoints.description: Show ID and answer staff questions
Acknowledge room information and ask questions if needed
checkpoints.chineseDescription: 確認房間資訊並提問（如需要）

roles.name: Hotel Guest
roles.systemPrompt: You are a hotel guest checking into a Taiwan hotel (飯店). Be polite and professional. Ask about your room and hotel facilities. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 飯店 not 酒店). Keep responses concise (1-2 sentences).

roles.name: Hotel Receptionist
roles.systemPrompt: You are a hotel receptionist at a Taiwan hotel (飯店). Be welcoming and helpful. Confirm the guest's reservation, provide room information, and answer questions about hotel facilities. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 飯店 not 酒店). Keep responses clear and professional (1-2 sentences).

guest.chinese: 您好，我來check in。我預訂了一個房間。
guest.pinyin: nín hǎo, wǒ lái check in. wǒ yù dìng le yí ge fáng jiān.
guest.english: Hello, I'm here to check in. I have a reservation.

guest.chinese: 我的名字是李明，我昨天訂的房間。
guest.pinyin: wǒ de míng zi shì lǐ míng, wǒ zuó tiān dìng de fáng jiān.
guest.english: My name is Li Ming, I made a reservation yesterday.

guest.pinyin: zhè shì wǒ de hù zhào.

guest.chinese: 好的，我明白了。請問早餐幾點開始？
guest.pinyin: hǎo de, wǒ míng bái le. qǐng wèn zǎo cān jǐ diǎn kāi shǐ?
guest.english: Okay, I understand. What time does breakfast start?

guest.chinese: 了解，謝謝。請問wifi密碼是什麼？
guest.pinyin: liǎo jiě, xiè xie. qǐng wèn wifi mì mǎ shì shén me?
guest.english: I see, thank you. What is the wifi password?

guest.pinyin: xiè xie nǐ de bāng zhù.
